\begin{tcAthena}
  by-induction evenb_S {
    Zero => (!chain [(even Zero)
                <==> (~ even Succ Zero)                   [even-def]])
  | (Succ k) => let {ih := (even k <==> ~ even Succ k)}
                  (!chain [(even Succ k)
                      <==> (~ even k)                     [ih]
                      <==> (~ even Succ Succ k)           [even-def]])
  }
\end{tcAthena}
%Foo bar.
